title: [Caffe2]How to start a distributed training task with gloo?
body_html:
If I want to train with three nodes 192.168.0.1, 192.168.0.2 and 192.168.0.3, how should I set the parameters of the command?

[--shard_id SHARD_ID]
[--run_id RUN_ID]
[--redis_host REDIS_HOST]
[--redis_port REDIS_PORT]
[--file_store_path FILE_STORE_PATH]

192.168.0.1:
--shard_id 0 --redis_host 192.168.0.1

192.168.0.2:
--shard_id 1 --redis_host 192.168.0.1

192.168.0.3:
--shard_id 2 --redis_host 192.168.0.1

Is this right? What about run_id ?
And should I do something to start redis server?
